data: Infrastructure Robotic Welding Advanced Technology: Our robotic welding systems ensure precise, consistent, and high-quality welds for a wide range of components. This technology enhances our production capacity while maintaining the highest standards of accuracy and strength. Applications: Ideal for welding structural components, pressure vessels, and heavy machinery parts. CNC Break Press Precision Bending: Our CNC break press machines offer precise bending and forming capabilities, allowing us to create complex shapes and components with high accuracy. The machines are equipped with anti-deflection systems, hydraulic tool clamping, and laser-based angle measuring systems to ensure consistent results. Applications: Used for bending and forming steel plates, beams, and other structural components. CNC Plasma Cutting Accurate Cutting: Our CNC plasma cutting machines provide accurate and efficient cutting of steel plates and sheets. The machines are capable of cutting materials up to 40 mm thick, ensuring that we can meet the needs of a wide range of projects. Applications: Used for cutting steel plates, beams, and custom components. Saw Welding Machine High-Quality Welds: Our saw welding machines are designed to provide highquality welds for large structural components. The machines are equipped with advanced features that ensure consistent welds with minimal distortion. Applications: Used for welding beams, columns, and other large structural components Laser Cutting Machine: Precision Cutting: Our laser cutting machines provide precise and efficient cutting of steel plates and sheets. The machines are capable of cutting complex shapes with high accuracy, ensuring that our components meet the exact specifications of our clients. Applications: Used for cutting steel plates, beams, and custom components. Shot Blasting Chamber Surface Preparation: Our shot blasting chamber is designed to clean and prepare steel surfaces by removing rust, mill scale, and other contaminants. The process enhances surface adhesion for subsequent coating or welding, ensuring longevity and quality of the components. Applications: Used for preparing steel beams, plates, and other fabricated parts before painting or coating, commonly used in structural steel production. Powder Coating Chamber: Durable Finishing: In our powder coating chamber, components are coated with a high-quality powder that provides a durable, corrosion-resistant finish. This process ensures even coverage, superior adhesion, and long-lasting protection from environmental elements. Applications: Applied to steel components such as beams, columns, and fabricated parts that require a resilient finish for outdoor or heavy-duty industrial applications. H-Beam Production Line: High-Speed Welding: Our advanced H-beam production line features state-of-the-art technology, including a straightening machine and simultaneous welding torches. The production line is equipped with 4 torches that work simultaneously to weld H-beams at an incredibly fast rate, ensuring high precision and productivity. Applications: Essential for producing H-beams used in construction, bridges, and industrial structures, this system ensures fast, accurate, and strong welds, significantly reducing production time.
